meta.title: PCSD offers Meal Service to students during COVID-19 Shutdown - PERSHING COUNTY SCHOOL DISTRICT

meta.content: PCSD offers Meal Service to students during COVID-19 Shutdown

March 17, 2020 Dear Pershing County School District Parents, Pershing County School District is pleased to announce that as of 2:20 p.m. today our Foodservice Department received permission from the Nevada Department of Agriculture that we can offer some meals to our students during this shutdown. Meal Service will be provided Monday thru Thursday beginning on Wednesday, March 18, 2020 thru April 9th. We will then resume food service after spring break on April 20th until the school closure is …

link.title: IMLAY ELEMENTARY - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: Today, Nevada Gov. Steve Sisolak formally issued a “Stay at Home” directive for Nevadans and extended the nonessential business, gaming and school closures and all other directives issued under the Emergency Declaration to April 30, 2020.

div.label: Translate Page

div.a: PERSHING COUNTY SCHOOL DISTRICTLogo link to home page

h1.span: PCSD offers Meal Service to students during COVID-19 Shutdown

span.p: Dear Pershing County School District Parents,

Pershing County School District is pleased to announce that as of 2:20 p.m. today our Foodservice Department received permission from the Nevada Department of Agriculture that we can offer some meals to our students during this shutdown. Meal Service will be provided Monday thru Thursday beginning on Wednesday, March 18, 2020.

strong.span: Meal Pick Up Locations and Times

span.p: Breakfast and Lunch Combo for children will be available at no cost

em.span: For Local Lovelock and Lovelock Valley Students.
For these locations look for a school district vehicle.

span.p: Site: Rye Patch Firehouse Parking Lot (For Rye Patch/Oreana Students)
Site: Imlay Elementary School Parking Lot (For all Imlay area students)

p.strong: *This is guidance from the Nevada Department of Agriculture: Students will need to show up to these locations to receive the food. Parents will not be able to pick up food without their child present.

span.p: For assistance/questions with food call PC School District Office at 775-273-7819 or e-mail Julie Myers at jmyers@pershing.k12.nv.us
